p: Enantiomer components and their enantiomer excesses ( ee) in L. paniculata EO obtained from the leaves and flowers were determined by enantioselective GCâ€“MS analysis. Three pairs of enantiomers were detected for the EO of leaves, and two pairs were detected for the EO of flowers, as shown in Table 2. The order of enantiomeric elution was established by the separated injections of the enantiomerically pure standards.
